channel.title: Need help adding pray to client and server
channel.description: Hi, i am trying to add prayer to client and server,my server base i think is drag-pkz or spade-scape, anyhow, my client is project purple base client, so i fixed nulls etc and am off2 my next add on, which is prayer, any idea what to do? i already defined them client sides, aka: public boolean atkpray = false; etc but no errors, and it doesn't work, also i believe im missing headicons for client sided, any help in finding or fixing these also?, tyvm plz reply, ill take even a small hint !!!!
